EmailTemplate.name: Mar 2017 presentation survey to 16/17 conacts
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different 2017/18 program advice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope that this email finds you well. This is Ryan Wood here, and I am the Director of Canadian Programs for Live Different. I am reaching out to all our school contacts that partnered with us in 2016/17 to ask for your advice as we plan our 2017/18 school programming. Educator feedback is so critical to helping us better serve schools and improving our impact, and I thank you for your consideration with this short survey.
Here is the survey link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfG_GoCI87xuG7BDNCTvI7KDYnMAgBAMkoPrUugjkTu8MyzJw/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.105534526=True&entry.1840663298={!Contact.Name}&entry.116583257={!Account.Name}&entry.103038865={!Contact.Id}
We greatly appreciate working with you in 2016/17, and look forward to the opportunity to partner with you again!
Thanks in advance,
Ryan Wood
Ryan Wood Director of Canadian Programs
Live Different Suite B3 - 15 Wellington St. North Hamilton, ON L8R 1M7 Canada
905-929-1662 Cell 905-777-1662 Office 905-777-8117 Fax ryan@livedifferent.com
www.livedifferent.com
Live Different is a movement challenging ourselves and others to a lifestyle of caring for people, not stuff. Live Different
